The Quranic researcher, that is: the whole of the recitation of the whole of the fire, and the integrity of the sequence, the zakat, and the torment arising from the killing.By that God has revealed the book with the truth, that is, by the fact that God Almighty descends the Qur’an or the Tawarah, who is crystallized by the truth, in which there is no heroic in the first place, the origin of the heroic, the origin of it, the origin of it, the origin of it, Katman.And those who have disagreed in the book, meaning: in his gender, that they believed in some of the books of God - the Almighty - and disbelieve in one or in the teeth, and the meaning of the sake of the time, and they will be dispensed.In it, or made what they have changed a successor in it, or in the Qur’an and their disagreement in it, the saying of some of them: It is magic, and some of them are poetry, In a row, that is, a disagreement.Beyond the right to the most severe torture, and this sentence is a sacrifice for what is given to it.Among the people who made (waw) to the condition and the advanced captivity is a feud to it and the dissolution was included in the defamation as it is not hidden.
